column1: D: How to use this webapp
column4: From the main menu you can choose three options: index~~~ add note and search for note. If you decide to delete all these notes that I have entered this webapp will still work.

column3: B: How to use this webapp part 2
column6: When adding a note you cannot leave either one of the fields empty~~~ otherwise no note will be added.

column3: A: How to use this webapp part 3
column6: This is an edited note. Meaning that if you select sort by edited~~~ this note should come to the top
